originalText.text: Queue was very long on christmas day but they handled the visitors very quickly. The quality of the ice is not so good and neither the skates are, but still the system overall is really efficient and well-managed. I had great time here.

text.text: Queue was very long on christmas day but they handled the visitors very quickly. The quality of the ice is not so good and neither the skates are, but still the system overall is really efficient and well-managed. I had great time here.

originalText.text: Total garbage. We bought tickets for 6 pm they said get in line. Then line says one hour wait from here. It was 2 hours. Then some guy offers to up sell you tickets to cut the line. Then total chaos from the door into the skate rental. Bathroom is a mess everything was broken and we get on the ice for 5 minutes before the scheduled cleaning kicks us off for 30 minutes. Ever other place that does times entry honors the time. This place is pure trash.

originalText.text: This place was a mad house. Tried looking for recent reviews to best plan the holiday trip. Purchased tickets in advance‚Ä¶ which was useless since they grouped walk-ins and those with advance purchase in one very long line. Tickets say to arrive 30 min prior to start time which happens to be a suggested time and not a guaranteed time. Took us 2 hours to get onto the rink with the long lines. Do not plan to bring a back pack. The locker won‚Äôt fit it and they don‚Äôt allow it on the rink. Once on the rink it‚Äôs free for all. Super crowded rink and although they try and have the traffics go one direction, nothing is really enforced. The staff were more into skating themselves than doing their job. If you have time constraints to your day don‚Äôt even bother attempting this place.

originalText.text: I highly recommend to come earlier than 2pm. Also make sure to buy tickets online because the line for tickets is huge!! Other than that, I definitely had a great time skating at this park with my kids. The views are stunning! The food inside is delicious, but they ask for the vaccine and PCR test so make sure to bring that with you :)üåáüí´

originalText.text: Great place to visit year round. Winter they have ice skating, summer they have rollerblading and great nightly ‚Äúevents or themes‚Äù with extremely well done lighting and music. Perfect place to go with friends, dates, kids or yourself for some laidback fun. It‚Äôs usually pretty packed but not overly concentrated where you can‚Äôt move. Employees working in every area are extremely friendly and helpful wanting to make sure you and guests have a good time. Highly recommend
